name: INSearchForBillsIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for searching for bills associated with the user.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveBillPayee(for: INSearchForBillsIntent, with: (INBillPayeeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the payee to use during your search.

items.name: func resolveBillType(for: INSearchForBillsIntent, with: (INBillTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the bill type to use during your search.

items.name: func resolveDueDateRange(for: INSearchForBillsIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the due date to use during your search.

items.name: func resolvePaymentDateRange(for: INSearchForBillsIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the payment date to use during your search.

items.name: func resolveStatus(for: INSearchForBillsIntent, with: (INPaymentStatusResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the bill status to use during your search.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchForBillsIntent, completion: (INSearchForBillsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can perform the search.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSearchForBillsIntent, completion: (INSearchForBillsIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles searching for the specified bills.
